content:
Announcing SUSHI 1.3.1 with the following enhancements and bug fixes:

  • Improved support for R5 CodeableReference type
  • Don't export untyped value[x] properties in instances
  • Fix bug that caused arrays to sometimes be exported as single items
  • Fix handling of only rules when profiles are applied to elements with existing slices
  • Fix typos in logging statements

For more details, see the SUSHI 1.3.1 Release Notes.
@Patrick Werner -- this fixes the bug you had reported over here.
